text: pattanavasikal asrad'dharayirunna samayatt musa avite katannu cennu. appeal avite rantupurusanmar parasparam pearutunnatayi addeham kantu. oral tanre kaksiyil pettavan. marrearal tanre satruvibhagattil pettavanum. appeal tanre kaksiyil pettavan tanre satruvibhagattil pettavannetiril addehatteat sahayam teti. appeal musa avane musticurutti iticcu. atavanre katha kaliccu. musa parannu: it pisacinre pravarttanattil pettatakunnu. avan vyaktamayum valipilappikkunna satru tanneyakunnu
